import React,{useRef,useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{gsap}from"gsap";import{Draggable}from"gsap/Draggable";import Preloader from'./Preloader';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{BsChevronCompactRight,BsChevronCompactLeft}from"react-icons/bs";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";gsap.registerPlugin(Draggable);const WeddingVIP=()=>{const[weddingVIPItems,setWeddingVIPItems]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const carouselRefs=useRef([]);const isMobile=()=>window.innerWidth<=500;// Fetch Wedding VIP items with filter for published status
useEffect(()=>{const fetchWeddingVIPItems=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/weddingvip"));// Filter only published items
const publishedItems=response.data.filter(item=>item.isPublished==='published');setWeddingVIPItems(publishedItems);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching wedding VIP items:",error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchWeddingVIPItems();},[]);// Shuffle items if necessary

const groupItemsByCategory=()=>{const groupedItems={};weddingVIPItems.forEach(item=>{if(!groupedItems[item.category]){groupedItems[item.category]=[];}groupedItems[item.category].push(item);});const shuffledGroupedItems={};Object.keys(groupedItems).forEach(category=>{shuffledGroupedItems[category]=shuffleArray(groupedItems[category]);});return shuffledGroupedItems;};// Get grouped wedding VIP items
const groupedWeddingVIPItems=groupItemsByCategory();// Carousel scroll functionality

useEffect(()=>{if(isMobile()){carouselRefs.current.forEach(carousel=>{if(carousel){gsap.killTweensOf(carousel);Draggable.create(carousel,{type:"x",bounds:{minX:-carousel.scrollWidth+carousel.clientWidth,maxX:0},inertia:true,throwProps:true,edgeResistance:0.65,onThrowUpdate:()=>{gsap.to(carousel,{x:carousel._gsap.x,ease:"power2.out"});},snap:{x:value=>Math.round(value/16.67)*200}});}});}},[groupedWeddingVIPItems]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Preloader,{});// Show Preloader while loading data
}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-custom",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid p-0",children:Object.keys(groupedWeddingVIPItems).map((category,index)=>{const carousel=carouselRefs.current[index];const isScrollable=carousel&&carousel.scrollWidth>carousel.clientWidth;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"div mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"my-2 fav-title",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col p-relative",children:[isScrollable&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"arrow left react-multiple-carousel__arrow react-multiple-carousel__arrow--left",onClick:()=>scrollCarousel(-1,index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsChevronCompactLeft,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"venueCarousel",ref:el=>carouselRefs.current[index]=el,style:{display:"flex",overflow:"hidden",width:"100%"},children:groupedWeddingVIPItems[category].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"venueImage",style:{flex:"0 0 16.67%",padding:"0 5px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/wedding-vip-packages/".concat(item._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"artistImage",children:[item.imageUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/").concat(item.imageUrl),alt:item.title,width:"100%",loading:"lazy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"artContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"artTitle",children:item.title})})]})})},item._id))}),isScrollable&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"arrow right react-multiple-carousel__arrow react-multiple-carousel__arrow--right",onClick:()=>scrollCarousel(1,index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BsChevronCompactRight,{})})]})})]},category);})})});};export default WeddingVIP;
